page.title: 11W.I., OVER 60s, CANFLD.SOCY.
page.content: GREAT CANFIELD WOMEN'S INSTITUTE: formed l983 to foster contact between widely scattered villagers. Membership currently around 30. Community oriented activities include fund raising for local hospice; village quilt (see art and crafts page 15) and participation in BBC Domesday Project. OVER 60s CLUB - Happy Circle: formed l962. Meets monthly in village hall or on organised outings. Membership currently about 45. GREAT CANFIELD SOCIETY: originally to raise funds to fight major expansion of Stansted Airport;the society now arranges and encourages village social activities.Profits from functions are donated to local causes particularly upkeep of Church and Village Hall fabric.
